Pseudocode

LOOP through numbers 0 - 100 IF number is a mulitiple of 3 THEN output "fizz" ELSE IF the number is a mulitiple of 5 THEN output "buzz" ELSE IF the number is a multiple of 3 and 5 THEN output "fizzbuzz" ELSE THEN output number

LOOP through numbers 0 - 100
IF the number is a multiple of 3 and 5
THEN output "fizzbuzz"
ELSE IF the number is a mulitiple of 5
THEN output "buzz"
ELSE IF number is a mulitiple of 3
THEN output "fizz"
ELSE
THEN output number
